quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit
What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.
Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.
A great figure or physique is nice, but it's self-confidence that makes someone really sexy.
With realization of one's own potential and self-confidence in one's ability, one can build a better world.
The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
You need an incredible amount of self-confidence to go digging around in someone's brain.
If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
Always be yourself and have faith in yourself. Do not go out and look for a successful personality and try to duplicate it.
You wouldn't worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do.
Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable.
Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Confidence, like art, never comes from having all the answers; it comes from being open to all the questions.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams and live the life you have imagined.
Confidence thrives on honesty, on honor, on the sacredness of obligations, on faithful protection and on unselfish performance. Without them it cannot live.
You have no control over other people's taste, so focus on staying true to your own.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
If you're presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything.
I've finally stopped running away from myself. Who else is there better to be
Low self-confidence isn't a life sentence. Self-confidence can be learned, practiced, and mastered - just like any other skill. Once you master it, everything in your life will change for the better.
One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: Turn back.
It is confidence in our bodies, minds and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
Embracing your true self radiates a natural beauty that cannot be diluted or ignored. Confident, powerful, untamable, badass you!
